categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens voice actors

nodes.text: Gregory Basim Grunberg (born July 11, 1966) is an American actor best known for his roles as the telepathic police officer Matt Parkman in the TV series Heroes and the CIA agent Eric Weiss in Alias.

Grunberg plays Resistance pilot Temmin "Snap" Wexley in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens and Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He revealed his role in the film on Twitter in September 2014. Grunberg gave no specifics at the time, saying that J.J. Abrams would "have him killed" if he did so.
